title: Why MVC is So Important
content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true seperation of concerns, devising theri code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the controller layer for application logic.

title: Authentication vs. Authorisation
content: There is a difference between authentication and authorisation. Authentication means confirming your identity, whereas authorisation means being allowed access to the system.

title: Object-Relation Mapping
content: I have really loved learning about ORMs. It's really simplified the way i create queries in SQL

title: Javscript is Fun
content: Its been such an enjoyabe journey learning Javascript.
